character_name: Lloyd Christmas: A goofy chip-toothed slacker who has been fired from several jobs. He has a crush on Mary Swanson
Harry Dunne: Lloyd's ditzy and airheaded best friend and roommate. He has a crush on Mary too
Mary Swanson: A wealthy but troubled heiress whose husband Bobby has been kidnapped. She was Harry and Lloyd's crush and both of them were unaware she was married.
J.P. Shay: A henchwoman of Nicholas Andre.
Joe "Mental" Mentalino: A henchman for Nicholas Andre. He has a stomach ulcer and regularly takes medication for it.
Beth Jordan (credited as "Athletic Beauty"): An FBI agent masquerading as a talkative young woman moving to
Sea Bass: A hot-tempered trucker who gets into frequent confrontations with Lloyd and Harry on their way to Aspen. Their first encounter was at a Pennsylvania diner.
Mrs. Margie Neugeboren (referred to by Harry as "Mrs. Noogieburger"): A dog owner and client of Harry's.
Billy: a blind and young boy who uses a wheelchair
